name: Stranded In Space (MAT4DOR)
description:
You are stranded in a moon, because you ran out of fuel! Construct buildings to generate perpellant, energy and metal, to fly back home.

Let’s see who does it faster. Post your time below!

Hope you enjoy. 

Instructions
  • [1-4] or [click image] to select building to construct
  • [left click] construct selected building
  • [right click] exit construction mode
  • [AWSD - move camera]
  • [mouse wheel - camera zoom]
